'''Erchirion''' was the son and second child of [[Imrahil]], [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].

He had an older brother, [[Elphir]], and younger siblings [[Amrothos]] and [[Lothíriel]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221</ref>
==Etymology==
The name is probably derived from ''[[ar-]] [[hîr]]'' (both meaning "noble lord") plus the frequent ending ''[[-ion]]'' "son of".

Alternatively, it could also derive from [[er]]-[[cirion]] meaning "lone shipman".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[David Salo]]|articleurl=https://tolkienlistsearch.herokuapp.com/message/5e9c3600df6700ce9c85c056|articlename=Re: Language chenges in Sindarin|dated=19 Oct 2012|website=[[Elfling]]|accessed=23 Sep 2022}}</ref>
